examples.korean: He is completely besotted with his new girlfriend. 발음듣기 그는 새 여자 친구에게 완전히 푹 빠져 정신을 못 차린다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He is completely besotted with his new girlfriend. 발음

examples.korean: His eyes dulled and he slumped to the ground. 발음듣기 그의 두 눈이 흐릿해지더니 그가 땅에 푹 거꾸러졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His eyes dulled and he slumped to the ground. 발음

examples.korean: to have a sound night’s sleep 발음듣기 밤잠을 깊이 푹 자다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: to have a sound night’s sleep 발음

examples.korean: He’s mad keen on planes. 발음듣기 그는 비행기에 미쳤다[푹 빠져 있다]. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He’s mad keen on planes. 발음

examples.korean: I had a good night’s rest. 발음듣기 나는 하룻밤 푹 잘 잤다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I had a good night’s rest. 발음
